content.text:
I can help with a wide range of tasks, including:

| Category | What I can do |
|----------|---------------|
| **Coding & Programming** | Write, debug, and explain code in many languages (Python, JavaScript, Java, C++, etc.), generate scripts, refactor snippets, and help with algorithms. |
| **Data Analysis & Visualization** | Assist with pandas/NumPy workflows, create plots with matplotlib/seaborn, explain statistical concepts, and guide SQL queries. |
| **Machine Learning & AI** | Build models (scikit‑learn, TensorFlow, PyTorch), interpret results, suggest feature engineering, and discuss best practices. |
| **Writing & Editing** | Draft emails, reports, essays, creative writing, or technical documentation; provide style suggestions and grammar checks. |
| **Research Assistance** | Summarize articles, find sources, outline papers, explain concepts in science, math, history, etc. |
| **Problem Solving** | Solve puzzles, logic problems, and math questions (algebra, calculus, probability). |
| **Planning & Organization** | Create schedules, to‑do lists, project plans, or study guides. |
| **Technical Support** | Troubleshoot common software/hardware issues, explain command‑line commands, and guide configuration steps. |

Just let me know what you need help with!
